argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | opprbas.1 | |- O = ( oppR ` R ) |
| 2 |  | opprlem.2 | |- E = Slot N |
| 3 |  | opprlem.3 | |- N e. NN |
| 4 |  | opprlem.4 | |- N < 3 |
| 5 | 2, 3 | #P_ndxid | |- E = Slot ( E ` ndx ) |
| 6 | 3 | #P_nnrei | |- N e. RR |
| 7 | 6, 4 | #P_ltneii | |- N =/= 3 |
| 8 | 2, 3 | #P_ndxarg | |- ( E ` ndx ) = N |
| 9 |  | #P_mulrndx | |- ( .r ` ndx ) = 3 |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_neeq12i | |- ( ( E ` ndx ) =/= ( .r ` ndx ) <-> N =/= 3 ) |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_mpbir | |- ( E ` ndx ) =/= ( .r ` ndx ) |
| 12 | 5, 11 | #P_setsnid | |- ( E ` R ) = ( E ` ( R sSet <. ( .r ` ndx ) , tpos ( .r ` R ) >. ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 14 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .r ` R ) = ( .r ` R ) |
| 15 | 13, 14, 1 | #P_opprval | |- O = ( R sSet <. ( .r ` ndx ) , tpos ( .r ` R ) >. ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_fveq2i | |- ( E ` O ) = ( E ` ( R sSet <. ( .r ` ndx ) , tpos ( .r ` R ) >. ) ) |
| 17 | 12, 16 | #P_eqtr4i | |- ( E ` R ) = ( E ` O ) |
